text: Say, .Whose testimony is the greatest?. Say, .Allah is the witness between me and you, and this Qurâ€˜an has been revealed to me so that I should thereby warn you, and whomsoever it may reach. Do you really bear witness that there are other gods along with Allah?. Say, .I bear no such witness. Say, .In fact, He is one God. I disown what you associate (with Him)
